General.Name: Millennium Silver Corp
General.Description: Millennium Silver Corp. acquires, develops, explores, and evaluates mineral properties in Canada and the United States. The company primarily explores for silver and gold deposits. It holds interest in the Silver Peak silver-gold project, which includes 211 claims covering an area of 4,000 acres located in southwest Nevada; the Simon Mine silver-lead-zinc project located in the Walker-Lane Trend south of Reno, Nevada. The company was formerly known as International Millennium Mining Corp. and changed its name to Millennium Silver Corp. in July 2021. Millennium Silver Corp. is based in New Westminster, Canada.
General.Address: 20 Sixth Street, New Westminster, BC, Canada, V3L 2Y8
